title: Hour 3 - Darius Rucker (06-23-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Darius Rucker (06-23-20)
description:
Darius Rucker Tells Dan that this Covid-19 time is the longest break in touring that he has ever had in his career. Darius says that the rally of support Bubba Wallace has received makes a statement; but he says hatred has made a statement too.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
